casebody.data:
NOLAN
v.
VILLAGE OF MARVIN. No. 488A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 14, 2005. Robert E. Hornik, Jr., Chapel Hill, for William J. Nolan, III, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of October 2005 by Respondent for extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent (Village of Marvin) shall have up to and including the 22nd day of November 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of October 2005."
